messages.welcome: Welcome to ShopBot! Browse our collection of products.
messages.cartEmpty: Your cart is currently empty. Browse our categories to add items.
messages.orderConfirmation: Thank you for your order! Your payment has been processed successfully.
messages.returnPrompt: Welcome back! Would you like to continue where you left off?
